    • Constructor Detail

      • FridgeModel

        public FridgeModel(java.lang.String uri,
                   java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit simulatedTimeUnit,
                   fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.SimulatorI simulationEngine)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        create an fridge model instance.

        Contract 

         pre    uri != null
 pre    simulatedTimeUnit != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI of the model.
        simulatedTimeUnit - time unit used for the simulation time.
        simulationEngine - simulation engine to which the model is attached.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
